title: How to Make a Citrus Cleaner

steps.headline: Pour the vinegar into a container for mixing.
steps.description: Mix in the sea salt. Keep stirring until the sea salt has completely dissolved.

steps.headline: Pour in the lemon or orange juice.
steps.description: Mix through. This will make the cleaner more caustic, making it a more effective cleaning agent for tougher stains.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into a spray bottle.
steps.description: Label so that you know what it is and when it was made.

steps.headline: Spray and wipe or scrub to remove the stains.
Wipe off with a warm cloth.

text: Pour the vinegar into a container for mixing. Mix in the sea salt. Keep stirring until the sea salt has completely dissolved. Pour in the lemon or orange juice. Mix through. This will make the cleaner more caustic, making it a more effective cleaning agent for tougher stains. Pour the mixture into a spray bottle. Label so that you know what it is and when it was made. Spray and wipe or scrub to remove the stains.  Wipe off with a warm cloth. Leave to dry.
